verses.name: 2 Samuel 17:1
verses.text: Moreover Ahithophel said unto Absalom, Let me now choose out twelve thousand men, and I will arise and pursue after David this night:

verses.name: 2 Samuel 17:2
verses.text: And I will come upon him while he is weary and weak handed, and will make him afraid: and all the people that are with him shall flee; and I will smite the king only:

verses.name: 2 Samuel 17:3
verses.text: And I will bring back all the people unto thee: the man whom thou seekest is as if all returned: so all the people shall be in peace.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 17:4
verses.text: And the saying pleased Absalom well, and all the elders of Israel.
